item.title: Trump lands trade deal with EU. And, Pete Buttigieg on what's next for Democrats
item.description: Trump announced a trade deal with the European Union yesterday, which is lower than the 30% previously threatened. And, Pete Buttigieg discusses where Democrats went wrong in the 2024 election.

item.title: Don't wait for the Perseids in August — look for meteors this week
item.description: A bright moon will make it hard to see the Perseid meteor shower in mid-August, but one night this week offers a decent chance of seeing some shooting stars.

item.title: Mental health warnings on social media? Minnesota will require them next year
item.description: Supporters say the pop-up messages could encourage Minnesotans, especially kids, to think twice about how much time they spend on sites. Social media companies argue that the law is heavy-handed.

item.title: Do 'work requirements' in Medicaid work? Georgia's been trying it for two years
item.description: Most states will have to establish work requirements for Medicaid by 2027. Georgia has had them for two years. Some Georgians say the glitchy system makes it too hard to prove they actually qualify.

item.title: Some kids need more protection from ultra-processed food. Here's why

item.title: Thailand and Cambodia agree to ceasefire. What's behind the conflict?
item.description: Cambodia and Thailand agreed to a ceasefire on Monday, set to start at midnight local time, after attending talks in Malaysia aimed at ending a 5-day border dispute that has left dozens dead.
